segments.text: My eyes drift to the left side of the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see a boy precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is reaching deep into an open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The jar is clearly labeled 'COOKIE JAR' inside the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's holding a plate, probably to catch the stolen goods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Next to him, a girl stands with her hand raised.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so expectant, obviously waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These two are quite the mischievous pair.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that stool is incredibly wobbly, its legs are splayed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could tip over at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm quite angry that an adult isn't supervising this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of risky behavior can lead to serious injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their sweet reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole situation just screams for intervention.
segments.speaker: PAR
